text: Netherlands participated in the 2010 Summer Youth Olympics in Singapore. The Dutch squad consisted of 36 athletes competing in 10 sports: aquatics (swimming), archery, badminton, cycling, gymnastics, field hockey, judo, rowing, sailing and table tennis. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size:90%" |- !
